Translations.Text: Arau sihamtara carai'ophale pradaksina karaiba cira kisorasakale; yetiya tumi sihamtaka dekhiba tomara ene lagiba yena sihamta biksipta mukuta
Arau tumi yetiya tata dekhiba, dekhibalai paba sbacchandya arau biraata samraajya
Sihamtara ararana ha’ba suksma se'ujiya raecama arau mota raecami pochaka arau sihamta alankrta ha’ba rauperae nirmita gamakharaurae, arau sihamtara pratipalake sihamtaka paraitra paniya pana karaaba
Niscaya e'itorae tomalokara puraskara; arau tomalokara karmapracesta achila prasansayogya
Niscaya ami tomara prati paryayakrame ala-kora'ana aratirna karaicho
Eteke tumi dhairyara saite tomara pratipalakara nirdesara pratiksa karaa arau sihamtara majara paraa kono papistha ba ghora akrtajna kaphirara anugatya nakaraiba
Arau puraa-gadhuli tomara pratipalakara nama smarana karaa
Arau raatira ekansata te'omra prati chajadaranata horaa arau raatira dirgha samaya te'omra paraitrata ghosana arau tachabiha patha karaa
Niscaya sihamta prthiraira jiranaka bhala paya arau sihamte sihamtara sanmukhara kathina dinatoka upeksa karae
Amiye'i sihamtaka srsti karaicho arau sihamtara gathana sudrrha karaicho. Arau ami yetiya iccha karaima tetiya'i sihamtara sthanata sihamtara darae (karaobaka) ani paraibartana karai dima
Niscaya e'ito eta upadesa; eteke yiye iccha karae si yena tara pratipalakara phale yoraara patha bachi laya
Arau allahe iccha nakaraile tomaloke iccha karaibalai saksama naha’ba; niscaya allaha mahajnani, prajnamaya
Te'om yaka iccha take'i nija rahamatara antarbhukta karae, arau yalimasakalara babe te'om prastuta karai raakhiche yantranadayaka sasti
Sapata kalyanasbaraupa praeraita batahara
tara pichata pracanda begata prabahita dhumuhara
sapata pracanda sancalanakaraira
tara pichata suspastaraupe parthakyakaraira
Tara pichata sihamtara, yisakale manuhara antarata upadesa paumca'i diye
ojara-apatti duraikarana arau satarka karaara babe
niscaya tomalokaka yi pratisrauti diya haiche seya arasye sanghatita ha’ba
Yetiya naksatraraaji alohina ha’ba
arau yetiya akasakhana bidirna karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya parbatasamuhaka curnabicurna karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya raachulasakalaka nirdharaita samayata upasthita karaa ha’ba
konato dinara babe e'ibora sthagita rakha haiche
bicara dinara babe
Arau kihe tomaka janaba bicara dirasa ki
se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Ami purbarartisakalaka dhbansa karaa na'ine
tara pichata parabartisakalako sihamtara anugami banama
Aparaadhibilakara lagata ami enekuraa acarane'i karao
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Ami tomalokaka ghrnaniya panira paraa srsti karaa na'ine
tara pichata ami iyaka niraapada sthanata suraksita karai raakhicho
eta nirdista samaya laike
tara pichata ami paraimapa karaicho, eteke ami kimana nipuna paraimapakarai
se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Ami prthiraikhanaka dharanakarairaupe srsti karaa na'ine
jiraitasakala arau mrtasakalara babe
arau ami tata sthapana karaicho sudrrha arau su'ucca parbatasamuha arau tomalokaka pana karaa'icho trsna nibaranakarai mitha upayogi pani
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
(Sihamtaka koraa ha’ba) tomaloke yaka asbikara karaichila, etiya gati karaa taraphale
Yoraa tinita sakha bisista ju'ira chamra pine
yito cham sitala nahaya arau i agnisikhara paraa raksa'o nakaraiba
niscaya jahanname utksepana karaiba brhat atraalika sadrsa phirainati
enekuraa yena haladhiya utara sraeni
se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
E'ito enekuraa dina yidina sihamte katha ka’ba noraaraiba
arau sihamtaka ajuhata peca karaara anumati'o diya naha’ba
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
‘E'ito phayacalara dina ami ekatraita karaicho tomalokaka arau purbarartisakalaka’
Eteke yadi tomalokara kono kausala ache tente prayoga karaa mora biraud'dhe
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba chamra talata arau nijaraa bahula sthanata
arau sihamtara hempaha anuyayi phalamulara majata
(Sihamtaka koraa ha'ba) tomaloke yi amala karaichila tara pratidanasbaraupe trptira saite panahara karaa
satkarmasilasakalaka ami enekuraa'i pratidana di thako
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
(He kaphirasakala!) Tomaloke ahara karaa arau bhoga karaa khantekara babe; niscaya tomaloka aparaadhi
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Yetiya sihamtaka koraa haya, ‘rauku’ karaa sihamte rauku’ nakarae’
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Eteke kora'anara paraibarte sihamte arau kona banira prati imana aniba
